Class Board

java.lang.Object
Board
public class Board extends Object
Handles the state and behavior of the game board including tile management, entity updates, spawning of zombies and suns, and wave logic. Called and updated by the game controller. Supports different spawn intervals depending on game phase and difficulty.
Since:
2025-06-27

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int l, int t)
      Constructs the board with the specified number of lanes and tiles.
      Parameters:
      l - Number of lanes.
      t - Number of tiles per lane.

  • Method Details

    • updateBoard

      public boolean updateBoard(double timeElapsed)
      Updates all game entities on the board each frame.
      Parameters:
      timeElapsed - Time in seconds since last frame.
      Returns:
      true if game over, false otherwise.

    • tryToSpawnZombie

      public boolean tryToSpawnZombie(int gameTime)
      Attempts to spawn zombies based on current game time and phase. Handles both regular waves and the final wave.
      Parameters:
      gameTime - Current game time in seconds.
      Returns:
      true if a zombie was spawned.

    • tryToSpawnSun

      public boolean tryToSpawnSun(int gameTime)
      Attempts to spawn sun on a random tile at regular intervals.
      Parameters:
      gameTime - Current game time in seconds.
      Returns:
      true if a sun was spawned.

    • updatePlants

      public void updatePlants(double timeElapsed)
      Updates all plants on the board and removes any dead ones.
      Parameters:
      timeElapsed - Time since last update.

    • updateProjectiles

      public void updateProjectiles(double timeElapsed)
      Updates all projectiles on the board. Handles projectile movement and collision with zombies.
      Parameters:
      timeElapsed - Time since last update.

    • updateZombies

      public boolean updateZombies(double timeElapsed)
      Updates zombies: state, movement, and attacks. Also checks for game over.
      Parameters:
      timeElapsed - Time since last update.
      Returns:
      true if a zombie enters the house (game over).

    • loadLevel

      public void loadLevel(int level)
      Initializes the level and tiles using the provided level number. Sets up the ArmorManager and loads level-specific armor data.
      Parameters:
      level - Game level to load.

    • resetBoard

      public void resetBoard()
      Resets the board state for a new game.

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Retrieves the current game level.
      Returns:
      The current level.

    • getSpecificLane

      public Tile[] getSpecificLane(int lane_n)
      Retrieves the array of tiles for a specific lane.
      Parameters:
      lane_n - The lane number.
      Returns:
      An array of Tile objects for the specified lane.

    • getAllLanes

      public Tile[][] getAllLanes()
      Retrieves all lanes on the board.
      Returns:
      A 2D array of Tile objects representing all lanes.

    • getMaxLanes

      public int getMaxLanes()
      Retrieves the maximum number of lanes on the board.
      Returns:
      The maximum number of lanes.

    • getMaxTiles

      public int getMaxTiles()
      Retrieves the maximum number of tiles per lane.
      Returns:
      The maximum number of tiles.

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(int laneNo, int tileNo)
      Returns a tile at the given lane and tile index.
      Parameters:
      laneNo - The lane number.
      tileNo - The tile number within the lane.
      Returns:
      The Tile at the given position.

    • getEntities

      public ArrayList<Entity> getEntities()
      Retrieves all in-game entities (zombies, suns, projectiles, plants) for rendering or update.
      Returns:
      A list of all Entity objects currently on the board.
